source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you come with a delivery today, or did you perhaps care for a spot of tea?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>いらっしゃい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
今日は依頼していたものを持ってきてくれたのかしら？
それとも、お茶にする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Ah, 'tis good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust the procurement of various odds and ends for the homestead program proceeds apace? I am ever so curious to see what wonders you will bring.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>よく来てくれたわ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
留学生用の魔器やトードの用意は順調かしら？
あなたが持ってきてくれるものを見るのが、楽しみで仕方ないの！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>Thank you for your continued support, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As I know all too well from my time as a student, 'tis nigh impossible to concentrate on an empty stomach─hence why I've a mind to keep a few luncheon coffers at hand, if I could trouble you with the task of procuring them.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、来てくれて嬉しいわ！
留学生たちが食事で困ることがないように、
魔法のランチボックスを用意していただけないかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─how are you? If you are ever in need of a respite, you are always welcome here. As we discussed, I would like as many mammets as you can prepare to aid the students' training.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの顔を見ると安心するわ。
魔法が不得手な子たちのために、特訓用の魔法人形をお願いね。
もし疲れていたら、うちでゆっくりしていっていいのよ？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>Welcome, welcome! I was just thinking of you. You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> stop by when time permits, yes? I've grown quite accustomed to your visitations, and it puts my heart at ease to know you are well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>いらっしゃい、そろそろ来てくれる頃かと思っていたわ。
お仕事の用事じゃなくても、顔を見せてくれると嬉しいのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>依頼品を渡す（<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>：残り<var 20 E803 /var>回）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Ameliance.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>アメリアンスに武具投影を行う

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>「お得意様取引」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>アメリアンスの信頼度について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>納品の条件と報酬について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>依頼品の入手方法

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>製作の「素材」の入手について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（製作編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（採掘・園芸編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（漁師編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Ameliance will come to trust you more and more, leading her to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品することで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>のあなたに対する信頼度は、
少しずつ上昇していきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Ameliance's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_001<tab>現在の信頼度は、依頼品リスト上部のゲージに表示され、
これが最大まで溜まることで、「信頼ランク」が上昇します。
なお、信頼ランクはハートマークの数で表現されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Ameliance and her efforts to further establish the academic homestead program at the Studium.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_002<tab>また、信頼ランクが上昇する際には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>にまつわる、
新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_000<tab>納品は、アイテムの種類に応じたクラスになり、
そのクラスのレベルが80以上の場合、
納品することができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_001<tab>納品時、クラスのレベルが89以下の場合は、
レベル90時のスクリップ報酬の代わりに、
経験値報酬を得られます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_000<tab>依頼品リストのアイテムの入手方法を調べたい場合は、
サブコマンドやアイテムヘルプを活用しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_001<tab>「クラフター全般」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「製作方法を検索」を実行すると、
製作手帳が開き、製作レシピが表示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_002<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「採集方法を検索」を実行すると、
採集手帳が開き、採集場所が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_003<tab>「漁師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「入手場所の表示」を実行すると、
該当の魚を入手できる釣り場・漁場が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_102_003<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、
釣り餌に「<var 28 ((Item)) F26FDA01 /var>」を使うとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Ameliance fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Ameliance deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_004<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>へ納品できるアイテムは、
「クラフター全般」と「採掘師／園芸師」、「漁師」の3種になり、
それらはすべて「収集品」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Ameliance seeks may be purchased from Synnove in the Agora.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_003_000<tab>依頼品の製作に必要な素材は、
オールド・シャーレアンの「アゴラ」にいる、
「よろず屋 シンノヴ」から購入可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_000<tab>クラフターの製作品の「収集価値」は、
製作時に「品質」を高めることで、上昇します。
そのため、できるだけ品質を高めて完成させることが重要です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_002<tab>品質が上がるアクションに成功すると、
自身に「インナークワイエット」が付与されていきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumlate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_003<tab>できるだけ多くのインナークワイエットを蓄積させておき、
最後に「ビエルゴの祝福」などで、
一気に品質を上げてから完成させるといいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_004<tab>他にも、品質を上げるために有用なアクションは存在します。
慣れてきたら、いろいろと試して自分なりの製作パターンを、
模索してみるとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_000<tab>収集品採集アイテムを選ぶと、特殊なウィンドウが表示されます。
収集品採集用アクションを使い、
「収集価値」を上げてから、アイテムを採集します。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_001<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」で収集価値を上げるには、
アクション「集中検分」を使用したのち、「純化」を使用します。
これを繰り返し、収集品アイテムを採集してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_002<tab>より高い収集価値を狙う場合は、
装備を整えて、「獲得力」「技術力」を高めてみましょう。
収集品採集用アクションの効果が高くなります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_003<tab>「GP」が不足しているようであれば、
装備を整えて、「GPmax」を高めてみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_000<tab>水産物は採集した「魚のサイズ」が、
そのまま「収集価値」となります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole or teeming waters where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing or spearfishing.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_001<tab>収集品として求められている魚がいる釣り場や漁場へ行き、
アクション「収集品採集」を使い、
釣り、または刺突漁を開始しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_002<tab>When fishing, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_002<tab>釣りでは、アクション「ペーシェンスII」を使ったあと、
適切なフッキングアクションを選ぶことで、
大きな魚を狙うことができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_003<tab>サイズが思ったように上がらない場合は「技術力」を、
装備を整えて高めてみましょう。

Furthermore, Ameliance deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

アイテムを納品することができます。

経験値報酬を得られます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>また、納品するアイテムの入手方法については、
それぞれ以下の方法で調べることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target:

ここオールド・シャーレアンのアゴラにいる、

target:

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、
釣り餌に「<var 28 ((Item)) F26FDA01 /var>」を使うとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Ameliance upon successful delivery.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>それぞれの納品アイテムは「収集価値」が高いほど、
納品時の報酬を多く得ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Ameliance and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>「収集価値の上げ方について」知りたい時には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「『お得意様取引』について聞く」を選んで確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Ameliance's trust.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、あなたの事を信頼し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Ameliance will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Ameliance's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your new business partner.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>納品時に得られる「信頼度」の蓄積を示すゲージが、
最大まで溜まると、「信頼ランク」が上昇し、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Ameliance needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>また、1週間で最大6回まで納品することが可能です。
積極的に収集品の納品を行い、
信頼ランクを上昇させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>今週分の納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>The quills you prepare will not only facilitate note-taking for lectures, but the transcription of rituals and spells as well. Pardon me while I take a closer look─the greater the aetherial conductivity of the instrument, the more conducive it will be to their studies, you understand...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>魔法大学で使う筆記具は、講義のメモを取るだけじゃなくて、
呪文や術式を書き写すときにも使うのよね。
だから、エーテル伝導率が高いものほど質が良いのだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>The magical arts require an appropriate focus through which to hone one's skills─whether it is an array of nouliths, a planisphere, cane, or magical concoction, there are numerous options. Quality is key, however, so please bear with me while I take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>魔法学を学ぶには、優れた魔器が必要不可欠……。
天球儀に、幻具に、賢具、それから魔法薬と種類も多いわ。
あなたが用意してくれたのは、どれかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>As a Sharlayan, I am all too aware of our propensity to prioritize nutrition over flavor in cuisine. Exposure to food from other cultures through the homestead program, however, has broadened many families' views on nourishment─you might say it's given us food for thought! But even the most delicious dishes can be spoiled if not kept at the proper temperature, which is why I must be certain this luncheon coffer is up to the mark.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>味よりも栄養効率を求めがちなシャーレアン人だけれど、
留学生を通じて、異文化の料理に興味を持つ人も出てきたようね。
保温や保冷性能に優れたものであれば、いいのだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_003<tab>As you know, mammets are invaluable tools for helping students gauge their capacity for aetherial manipulation. Everything from their clothes down to their very cores must be highly conductive to aether if we are to observe clear results. Now, if you will allow me to inspect...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_003<tab>魔法人形は、使い手の命令を受容し、動作に表すもの……
だから魔力感度が高いものほど性能に優れていると言えるわ。
コアも、そのお洋服も、繊細な調整が求められるのだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>The regions hit worst by the Final Days are in dire need of school supplies. It is my hope that by working together, we can make a difference. Goods with a long shelf life are preferred, but every little thing helps. If you'll allow me a moment to inspect...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>終末現象の被災地域では、まだまだ教育環境の改善が必要よ。
学び舎を失った子どもたちのために、
なるべく長持ちする品を、送ってあげたいところだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>When writing the particulars of a spell or ritual on parchment, much like ink, a quill highly conductive to aether will provide the best results. As feathers are the key material, I would carefully inspect each and every one─if you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>呪文や術式を書き記す際には、
インクだけでなく、ペンのエーテル伝導率も高い方がいいのよ。
あなたが用意してくれた羽根は、どんなものかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>As you are doubtless aware, crystals are the primary catalyst of magical foci─and the purer the crystal, the greater its potency. Procuring those suitable to our needs, however, is no trifling task...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>クリスタルに代表される魔法の触媒は、
言わずもがなだけれど、純度が高いものほど性能に優れているわ。
ただ、それを調達するのは至難の業なのよね……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_002<tab>I know from experience that those engrossed in their work are wont to forget meals from time to time─students in particular. That is why I wish to provide them with new luncheon coffers. Of course, they will be of little use if not properly insulated. Might I have a look at the materials you prepared?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_002<tab>料理の鮮度を保つためには、
ランチボックスの素材に、どれほど保冷性があるかが大切なの。
品質が良ければ、それだけ保ちもいいのだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_003<tab>Mammets require a healthy supply of lubricating oils to keep their joints in good order. Not just any lubricant will do, however─the more impurities in the oil, the less responsive they will be to aetherial manipulation. Let us see what we have here...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_003<tab>魔法人形は関節が多いから、潤滑油が不可欠……
でも、不純物が多いほど魔力抵抗が大きくなってしまうわ。
質のいい油を用意してくれると助かるのだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>The regions hit worst by the Final Days are in dire need of school supplies, so any resources we can provide will surely be of help. Materials fit for use even in harsh environments would be ideal.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>終末現象の被災地域では、まだまだ教育環境の改善が必要よ。
どんな環境にも耐えられるよう、
耐久性を重視して、素材を選びたいところだけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>In case you were wondering how writing ink is made from this cephalopod, the ink from its ink sac is first extracted, then mixed with a unique solution. The resulting precipitate is subsequently recovered, and voilà! The quality of ink varies between specimen, however, so I would prefer to inspect each one you bring individually. Let's have a look, shall we?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>筆記用のインクは、一度特殊な溶液を混ぜて成分を沈殿させてから、
必要な成分だけを抽出して加工するそうよ。
質がいい素材であればあるほど、書き心地も滑らかなのだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>The seedtoad has a variety of uses, but is primarily utilized as a familiar at the Studium. A particularly resourceful one would make for a fine familiar indeed!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>トードの使い道は、それはさまざまなのだけれど、
魔法大学では主に使い魔として扱われることが多いかしらね。
賢くて活きのいいトードなら喜ばれるのだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>The way a meal is presented has an influence on its flavor, would you not agree? Well, most Sharlayans would not. Students from abroad, however, should undoubtedly appreciate the gesture.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>見た目にも綺麗なランチボックスの方が、食欲がわくでしょう？
……この考えは、なかなかこの国の人たちに理解されないのよね。
でも、他の国から来た子たちは気にすると思うのだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>Did you know a mammet's eyes are often made from a light-emitting material? The design offers myriad benefits, such as the ability to function in environments devoid of light. That said, it can be quite the frightful experience to find a pair of piercing, bright eyes staring at you in the dark.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>魔法人形の目にあたる部分には、発光素材を使うのが一般的よ。
暗闇で光っているのを見ると、ちょっとドキッとするわよね。
光がなくても物を認識できるようにとか、理由は様々だけれど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>The satrap of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han has graciously offered his full consent for natural resources from Thavnair to be distributed around the world and used in the creation of educational materials, all to provide aid to other calamity-struck nations. Coral of superior quality is certain to produce a vibrant-colored chalk to brighten any child's day.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>ラザハンの太守様からも、各地の教育復興のためならばと、
サベネア島の素材を調達することを快諾していただいたのよ。
質のいいサンゴからは、発色のいいチョークが作れるのだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>I knew you would not disappoint! Indeed, I can find no qualms with the quality of your work.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>さすがだわ！
ありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
うん、私の目から見ても品質に申し分ないわ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>My, this looks to be of remarkable quality! You have gone above and beyond. I suspect supply may fail to meet demand when word of this spreads among the students.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>まあ、これはとても良いものだわ！
これだけの品質のものを用意いただけるなんて……
留学生どころか、在学生からも問い合わせが殺到しそうね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>I...I am at a loss for words. This is simply outstanding! Should students grow accustomed to such immaculate craftsmanship, I fear nothing less will ever satisfy them again. I shall take great pains to explain the unique circumstances under which this has been commissioned.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>これは……言葉を失ってしまうほど素晴らしいわ！
この品質を覚えてしまったら、他の品では満足できないかも……。
留学生たちには、これが特別な品だと、きちんと説明しないと。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Yes, this appears to be sufficiently sensitive to aether. The students will be pleased to have a mammet so well suited to practicing their healing magicks.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>これがあれば、魔法人形を使った特訓も万全ね！
治癒魔法のような繊細な魔法にも応えてくれるに違いないわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>Thanks to your efforts, we have ensured a brighter future for children the world over. A dream, I suspect, some would have otherwise believed impossible. Perhaps, given time, all children will be afforded the opportunity to learn they so rightfully deserve.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>あなたのおかげで、きっと道を閉ざされていた子も救われる。
世界中の子どもたちに、学ぶ機会が平等に訪れますように……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>所持品に空きがないため、信頼ランク上昇の報酬を、
受け取ることができません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Ameliance once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>所持品を空けてから、<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>Perfect, this is more than enough for now. You've done amazing work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>本当に、あなたにお願いして大正解！
そうね……当面はこれだけ用意してもらえれば十分だわ。
ありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>It occurs to me that, for all your prowess in battle, Alphinaud and Alisaie appear wholly unaware of your remarkable skills as an artisan. Perhaps I shall take this opportunity to boast of your many talents in my next letter to them.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>ねえ、あなたの職人としての顔って、
子どもたちもよく知らない一面だったりするんじゃない？
今度お手紙で自慢しちゃおうかしら……ふふふ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>I have wonderful news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The students have naught but praise for your marvelous supplies. Indeed, it appears the program is a smashing success! Why, even my former mentor saw fit to congratulate me. Rest assured, however, I told him I could not have done it without you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>あなたのおかげで、留学生からの評判がとってもいいの！
私が学生の頃の恩師にまで褒められちゃった。
ふふっ、あなたの協力があったからだって、しっかり伝えたわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>I only hope the supplies have also been of use to Mila. Once she has a solid grasp of aether manipulation, I've no doubt our resources will further bolster her flourishing skills. Alas, I must give her the space to learn in her own time.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>ミラちゃんにとっても、魔法習得の一助となるといいのだけど。
魔力の素養はあるようだから、コツさえ掴めば上達は早いはずよ。
でも、こればっかりは、本人次第だからもどかしいわ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>Ah, there's our master artisan. You'll be happy to hear students have been quite pleased with their meals of late, thanks in no small part to your luncheon coffers.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげで、
留学生たちが、学食の味に悩むことは減りそうよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>When they attended the Studium, Alisaie would always request her meals be prepared, while Alphinaud was always quite happy to sate his appetite with Archon loaf─each and every day. A peculiar trait he inherited from his father.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>そういえば、アリゼーにはお弁当をよく頼まれたけれど、
アルフィノはほとんど賢人パンで済ませていたわ。
変なところが父親似なのよね……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Your generosity knows no bounds, and I fear we Leveilleurs have come to rely overmuch on your giving nature. Would that we could simply adopt you into the family, if only to ease my guilt.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>あなたって本当に頼りがいがあるわ。
一家全員で、頼りすぎかしらね……？
ふふっ、もういっそのこと、うちの子にならない？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>Fear not─I merely jest. Besides, the paperwork alone would surely strike fear even in Fourchenault's heart... Oh, but listen to me prattle on while Mila prepares to return home to Thavnair. I should be helping with preparations. It pains me that she must leave, but it's for the best.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>……なんて冗談を言っているうちに、
ミラちゃんが帰国する日が近づいてきちゃった。
寂しいけれど、こればかりは仕方ないわ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_001<tab>I-I've returned from the Studium, Lady Ameliance!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_001<tab>アメリアンスさん、ただいま帰宅いたしました！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>Welcome home, Mila. How was your first day of classes?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>お帰りなさい、ミラちゃん。
初めての授業はどうだった？
お友達はできた？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_003<tab>Oh, it was wonderful! Not only the professors, but my classmates too were astonishingly friendly─I can hardly believe how many friends I've already made!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_003<tab>はい！　すごく楽しかったです！
みんなとても親切にしてくれました！
それに、なにもかもが新鮮で……新しい世界が広がりました！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>That is reassuring to hear. And I must say, you wear the uniform quite well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>よかった、安心したわ。
制服もとっても似合っているわよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_005<tab>Goodness, you're making me blush! ...Thank you, Lady Ameliance. Not <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> for the compliment, but for everything. Once I have learned to wield spells from my studies here, I can return home triumphant having proved my mother wrong!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_005<tab>えへへ、ありがとうございます！
みなさんのご恩に報いるためにも、母に認めてもらうためにも……
私、絶対にこの留学中に、魔法を覚えて帰ります！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_006<tab>...Would you care to elaborate?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_006<tab>……お母様に？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_007<tab>Ah, yes─of course. For generations, those in my family have traditionally become alchemists, each of us pouring our hearts and souls into the creation of medicine.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_007<tab>うちはサベネアで代々続く、錬金術師の家系なんです。
とくに治療薬の精製に、一族は心血を注いできました。
でも……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_008<tab>The Final Days, however, changed everything. I saw firsthand that there are countless lives not even the most advanced medicine can save...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_008<tab>あの終末以来……私の中ですべてが変わりました。
薬だけでは救えない命がある……
そんな事実を、突きつけられましたから。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_009<tab>I came to the decision that I must learn to wield magic, even if it meant traveling as far as Sharlayan. Against my mother's wishes─but at my father's urging─I took my chances, and made the journey here.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_009<tab>だから私、治癒魔法を学ぶためにシャーレアンに来ました。
実は、母には猛反対されたのですが……
最終的には父の許可をもらって飛びだしてきたんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_010<tab>You have been through an awful lot... Why, pray tell, is your mother so opposed to your learning spellcraft?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_010<tab>そうだったの……。
お母様は、なぜ反対なさっていたの？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_011<tab>I cannot say for certain, but...alchemy has long been a source of pride for my family. She may find my decision to study an alternate discipline offensive, as though I am rejecting my lineage in some way─which simply isn't the case!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_011<tab>たぶん……一族の治療薬に誇りを抱いているからだと思います。
私が治癒魔法を学ぶことが、
家業を否定しているように映るのでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_012<tab>Though I love alchemy, I am not so beholden to it that I'm blind to its shortcomings. To me, the decision is simple: if magic can save more lives than medicine, then I must learn to wield it. Even if it breaks my mother's heart.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_012<tab>私だって、錬金術を誇らしく思っています。
でも、薬で救えない命を救えるなら、手段に固執したくない。
だから……何としてでも、治癒魔法を習得して帰りたいんです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_013<tab>...With all that said, I still hardly know left from right when it comes to spellcraft. I'm surprised my application for the academic homestead was even accepted in the first place.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_013<tab>って言っても、私は魔法を使うのが初めてで……。
大学から留学の許可が下りたことが不思議なくらいです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_014<tab>You have earned your place here, Mila. Nothing more, nothing less. But thank you for speaking so candidly with us. Know that you have our full support─whatever you need, pray do not hesitate to ask.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_014<tab>話してくれてありがとう、ミラちゃん。
あなたがこの留学で積む経験が、納得のいくものになるよう、
私たちもしっかりサポートするわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_015<tab>You are both far too kind! I have a lot of ground to make up, but I promise I won't let you down!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_015<tab>ありがとうございます！
よーっし！　早く周りに追いつけるように、全力で頑張ります！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_001<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I didn't realize you were visiting. Actually, there was something I wanted to tell you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、こんにちは！
いらしていたんですね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_002<tab>I really appreciate the work you've done, procuring all sorts of things for myself and the other students─your support has meant the world to us! So...thank you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_002<tab>私たちのために素晴らしいものをご用意くださって、
いつも本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_003<tab>Well then, I'd better be off─a lot of spells to practice, and so little time. I mustn't drag my feet, lest I get left behind my peers!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_003<tab>それでは、私はこれで……
治癒魔法の練習に行ってまいりますので！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>Just a moment, Mila.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>あっ……ちょっと待ってミラちゃん！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_005<tab>I could not help but notice that you seem a touch out of sorts... Pray tell, is something the matter?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_005<tab>いつもより少し元気がないようだけれど……
何かあった？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_006<tab>Wh-Whatever do you mean? I couldn't feel better!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_006<tab>えええっ……そうですか……？
みなさんが良くしてくださるおかげで、元気モリモリですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_007<tab>...Are you sure? Though faint, the gauntness of your cheeks indicates otherwise.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_007<tab>ううん、だって少しやつれているもの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_008<tab>I have no doubts you enjoy your meals here at home, but I cannot speak for elsewhere... What can you tell me of the food at the Studium?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_008<tab>うちのご飯はしっかり食べてくれているけれど……
大学の方ではどうなのかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_009<tab>U-Um...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_009<tab>うっ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_010<tab>Aha! As I thought. Believe it or not, meals at the Studium were considered <var 1A 02 /var>gruesome<var 1A 01 /var>─to put it lightly─even in my day. A damning statement considering our woefully low culinary standards.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_010<tab>やっぱり……相変わらずなのね。
私が在学していた頃も、学食は酷いものだったわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_011<tab>Forgive me for not noticing sooner, Mila. From now on, I shall personally prepare lunch for you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_011<tab>気が付かなくてごめんなさい、ミラちゃん。
次からはお弁当を作ってあげるわ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_012<tab>Wh-What!? No, no, I couldn't bear to inconvenience you any further!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_012<tab>ええっ！？
そんな……これ以上お手間をおかけするわけには……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_013<tab>Inconvenience? Don't be ridiculous─we are family, my dear!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_013<tab>いいのよ、家族なんだから、
本当に気を遣わないでちょうだい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_014<tab>Right then! I'd love to learn how to cook Thavnairian dishes, if you would care to teach me. Come, let us away to the kitchen!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_014<tab>そうだわ！
私にサベネア風のお料理を教えてもらえない？
一緒に作りましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_015<tab>L-Lady Ameliance, we servants would be happy to serve anything you wish! I must insist that you leave the cooking to us!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_015<tab>ア、アメリアンス様……！
お料理なら、わたくしどもがやりますので！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_016<tab>Thank you, Meryld, but that won't be necessary. Though I am out of practice, I am not wholly bereft of culinary skill. After all, it was I who often prepared luncheon coffers for Fourchenault when we were students. And I'm quite glad I did─his propensity for Archon loaf would have ruined his figure otherwise.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_016<tab>いいの、いいの！
学生時代も、賢人パンばっかり食べていたフルシュノさんに、
よくお弁当を作って差し入れていたんだから。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_017<tab>Now─let us go and put the kitchen to good use, shall we?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_017<tab>さ、厨房に行きましょうミラちゃん！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_018<tab>Y-Yes!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_018<tab>は、はいっ……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_019<tab>B-But! Lady Ameliance, p-please reconsider!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_019<tab>アメリアンス様ぁ……！！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>There is a matter I wish to discuss with you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>そうそう、あなたに相談したいことがあるのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>It concerns Mila... I fear she may be having difficulty with spellcraft.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>ミラちゃんのことなんだけど……
あの子、魔法の習得がうまくいっていないみたいなの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>'Tis a complex art that cannot be learned quickly, nor through pure effort─one must have the aptitude for it.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>当然、一朝一夕で覚えられるものじゃないわ。
素養がなければ、どんなに努力しても身に付かないこともある。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>Fortunately, from what I've observed, Mila appears to have not only the capacity to wield magic, but also a clear understanding of how it works─in theory, at least. And, as you have seen yourself, she holds a strong desire to succeed.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>でも、私の見立てでは、彼女には魔力の素養があるわ。
理論は完璧に理解しているようだし、かける想いも強い。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>But I fear her determination is merely born of stubbornness... With each passing day, she returns home later and later.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>だからこそ……
日に日に、帰宅が遅くなっているのが心配なのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_005<tab>Lest you wonder, being the considerate soul that she is, Mila always sends word in advance. Even today she notified me that she would be studying on campus until late.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_005<tab>もちろん遅くなるときは、事前に言ってくれるし、
今日も、構内で練習してから帰ると連絡があったわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_006<tab>I understand all too well the desire to prove oneself, but it should never come at the cost of one's own health. I must speak with her immediately, before she falls ill─or worse.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_006<tab>でも、根を詰めすぎて倒れてしまったら大変でしょう？
だから今から、迎えに行こうと思っていたの。
直接、顔を見て話したくてね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_007<tab>You may think me overprotective, but she is still just a child. I have a duty to look after her, both as a mother and a friend.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_007<tab>過保護と思うかもしれないけれど、
あの子のホストマザーとして、そして友人として……
ブレーキをかけるのは私の役目。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_008<tab>...Yet the Studium is ever so large, is it not? I would be eternally grateful if you would help me search for her.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_008<tab>……なのだけれど、魔法大学ってなにせ広いでしょう？
良かったら、一緒に探してもらえると助かるのだけれど……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_009<tab>Wonderful! You need but say the word─I am ready to leave at a moment's notice.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_009<tab>ああ、本当にありがとう！
出発の準備ができたら、声をかけてもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_000<tab>Lady Ameliance, Meryld, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Though my time in Sharlayan was short, full glad am I that I was able to spend it with you. There are no words with which I can adequately express my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_000<tab>アメリアンスさん、メリルドさん、
そして<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
短い間でしたが、大変お世話になりましたっ……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>My, how time flies. It seems like it was only yesterday you first walked through those doors... I will miss you dearly, Mila, but I know all too well how your parents must be feeling.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>本当にあっという間……。
寂しいけれど、ご両親が帰国を待ちわびているものね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_002<tab>I know I have said it many times, but please let me say it once more: thank you─from the bottom of my heart. Countless students, myself included, never would have been able to study abroad if not for your support.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_002<tab>本当にありがとうございました。
私を含め、支援がなければ留学を経験できなかった留学生も、
きっと少なくありません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_003<tab>I can scarcely imagine how my studies would have turned out had it not been for the amazing resources you and Lady Ameliance prepared...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_003<tab>ホストファミリーになって頂いたルヴェユール家の皆さんと、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんがそろえてくれた、
素晴らしい品々がなければ、とても……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_004<tab>And, while I don't quite have something to offer as thanks, I do have something to show you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_004<tab>それで……お礼という訳ではないのですが、
おふたりに、見ていただきたいものがあります……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_005<tab>Here I go...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_005<tab>いきます……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_104_005<tab>(Now collapse, just as I practiced...)
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_104_005<tab>そのまま仰向けに倒れて……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_006<tab>My word! You've learned to control it with such finesse!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_006<tab>すごいわ……完璧に操作できているもの！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_007<tab>Oh, I can do more than that...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_007<tab>まだです……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_008<tab>Mila... How─ <var 1A 02 /var>When<var 1A 01 /var> did you learn to wield healing magicks like that?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_008<tab>ミラちゃん……
あなた、いつの間に治癒魔法を……！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_009<tab>Ah, but that is beside the point. This is the fruit borne of your hard work, and I could not be prouder of you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_009<tab>本当に、本当に、よくここまで頑張ったわね。
あなたを心から誇りに思うわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_010<tab>It fills me with such joy to hear you say those words...but I must give credit where credit is due. I have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to thank for all of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> wonderful supplies, the professors at the Studium for their patient instruction, and you most of all, Lady Ameliance, for always believing in me!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_010<tab>えへへ、ありがとうございます。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが作ってくれた人形と、
大学の先生方、それにアメリアンスさんのご指導のおかげです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_011<tab>There is something you should know... I have decided to pursue alchemy when I return home.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_011<tab>……私、故郷に戻ったら、錬金術の修行に入ります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_012<tab>By studying the art of spellcraft, I feel that I have come to understand the advantages and disadvantages inherent between the two disciplines.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_012<tab>治癒魔法を学んだことで、魔法と錬金術の違いと、
それぞれの長所と短所が見えてきた気がするんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_013<tab>It was when I first came to this realization that an idea sprung to mind─what if I were to master <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var>? I could compensate for the weaknesses of one with the strengths of the other, and help even more people that way.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_013<tab>その両方を会得すれば、
長所を掛け合わせ、短所を補い合うこともできる……
そんなイメージが湧いてきたんです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_014<tab>What I'm trying to say is...once I finish my training with alchemy, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> return here! This, I promise you, Lady Ameliance!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_014<tab>だから、アメリアンスさん。
錬金術の修行を終えることができたら、
私、必ずオールド・シャーレアンに戻ってきます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_015<tab>So...when that day comes, may I visit you again?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_015<tab>そうしたら……また、会いに来てもいいですか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_016<tab>Mila! You hardly need ask. It's a promise.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_016<tab>ミラちゃん……！
ええ、ええ、もちろんよ！
必ず会いにきてちょうだい、約束よ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_017<tab>There was just one other matter. Everyone in the house came together to prepare a parting gift for you. I do hope you'll like it.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_017<tab>それからね、このルヴェユール邸のみんなから、あなたへ。
贈り物があるのだけれど……受け取ってくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_018<tab>Gods, these clothes...they're so beautiful I could cry! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_018<tab>わあ、なんて素敵なお洋服……！
嬉しい……みなさん、本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_019<tab>As a master artisan, what do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Do they suit me?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_019<tab>どうですか？
私、似合っていますか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_020<tab>I am thrilled─if not a touch relieved─that you like it. I pray it serves as a lasting reminder of your time here.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_020<tab>気に入ってくれて嬉しいわ。
あなたの人生が輝かしいものであるように、
みんなで願いを込めて作ったの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_021<tab>Oh, I could never forget anything about this place. Not the people I've met, nor the memories I've made...all of it, I will treasure forever.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_021<tab>宝物にします！
このお洋服も、ここでの経験も、
ずっとずっと……私の人生の宝物です！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_004_022<tab>Miss Miladeen, I'm afraid the time of your ship's departure draws near. We had best be setting off.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_004_022<tab>ミラディーン様、そろそろ出発のお時間です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_023<tab>...I knew this moment would come, but even so, I'm not ready to bid farewell. And after receiving such a lovely gift...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_023<tab>ああ……もう、こんな素敵な贈りものをいただいたら、
ますますお別れが辛くなっちゃいます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_024<tab>Everyone, I...I will miss you all so much...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_024<tab>私、みなさんのことが大好きです……！
本当に……ほんとうに……っ……ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_025<tab>And we, you, Mila. Safe travels, and know that we will always be thinking of you. May your journey in life be one full of love and laughter─the selfsame gifts you gave to all of us.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_025<tab>私たちも大好きよ。
行ってらっしゃい、ミラちゃん。
あなたの人生の旅路が、素敵な笑顔で溢れますように。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_026<tab>Th-Thank you, Lady Ameliance! ...I will do my best. Until we meet again!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_026<tab>はいっ！
行ってきます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_100<tab>I've no doubt there are other students from abroad who, much like Mila, yet struggle with their spellcraft.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_100<tab>留学生の中には、ミラちゃんみたいに、
初めて魔法に取り組む子も少なくないと思うわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_101<tab>As such, supplemental tools for their studies shall prove beneficial─toads and magical foci most of all. The better the quality, the more quickly they shall be able to master the basics. I trust I can count on your assistance?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_101<tab>そこでお願いしてもいいかしら？
魔法を扱うための、魔器やトードを用意してもらいたいの。
質が良いものであればあるほど、上達も早いのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_102<tab>Marvelous! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_102<tab>ありがとう、とっても頼もしいわ。
よろしくお願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_100<tab>'Tis only natural Mila would grow homesick, and yet somehow I failed to notice. A taste of home from time to time would no doubt lift her spirits, but we've only the bland cuisine of Sharlayan to offer her. Which is why I suspect that, rather than endure the questionable repast of the Studium, she chooses to suffer pangs of both longing and hunger when she's away.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_100<tab>はぁ……もっと早くに気付いてあげればよかったわ。
ただでさえ、故郷の味は恋しくなるはずなのに、
そもそもシャーレアンの料理って……ねぇ？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_101<tab>It breaks my heart to think that there may be other students suffering in silence just as Mila did. To err on the side of caution, I will advise the other homestead families to be particularly mindful when it comes to matters of nourishment.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_101<tab>ミラちゃんみたいに困っている子が他にもいたら大変だわ。
他のホームステイのご家庭にも、
食事には特に気を遣ってあげるように言っておかなきゃね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_102<tab>Speaking of which, students who share Mila's passion for learning are often wont to remain at the Studium from their first classes in the morning until well after the last bell. Luncheon coffers able to keep their food fresh during those long hours would go a long way to quell any dietary issues they may have. I trust I can count on you to supply the requisite coffers?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_102<tab>それから、あなたにも調達してもらいたいものがあるの。
長時間持ち歩いても、傷まないし冷めない……
魔法のランチボックスを用意してもらえると助かるわ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_100<tab>It never gets easier watching them leave. You can only hope you've done enough to prepare them for what will come next.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_100<tab>こうして背中を見送るのは、
なんど経験しても寂しいものね……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_101<tab>...But I should not burden you with such musings─certainly not when I have good news to share. Several homestead families have informed me that the students in their care were able to finish their studies in Sharlayan, and return home safely. An accomplishment we could not have achieved without you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_101<tab>さて、他の家庭で預かっていた留学生たちも、
無事に多くを学んでシャーレアンを後にしたと報告があったわ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_102<tab>Our success here has inspired me to look beyond Sharlayan's borders. There is no time for idleness. Not when there are still children who lack for opportunities to better themselves.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_102<tab>この成功を機に、もっと支援の幅を広げるつもりよ。
留学生をオールド・シャーレアンに受け入れるだけでなく、
異国での学習支援も行おうと思っているの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_103<tab>Which is not to say I will be refusing more students for academic homestead─far from it!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_103<tab>もちろん、このルヴェユール邸でも、
引き続きホームステイは受け入れていくつもりよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_104<tab>Though, it would be something of a shock for Alphinaud and Alisaie to find what they believe to be a stranger boarding in our home. And if Fourchenault were to find out... Well, I must simply see to it that he doesn't.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_104<tab>フルシュノさんや子どもたちが帰ってきたら、
知らない子が住んでるんだから、さぞ驚くでしょうね。
……それまで、秘密にしておこうかしら。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_105<tab>Now, before I forget, I do hope you liked the attire we made for Mila, because I have another set being prepared for you as we speak.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_105<tab>そうそう、ミラちゃんにプレゼントしたお洋服、
実はあなたの分も用意している最中なのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_106<tab>Naturally, we needed to finish hers first, but yours will be ready shortly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_106<tab>帰国が迫っていたミラちゃんを優先してしまったけれど、
仕上がるまで、少し待っていてもらえると嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_107<tab>While we're on the subject of dress, I would ask a favor of you, but please─not a word of this to anyone. If you happen upon any garments you think may suit me in your travels, I should like to borrow them, if only for a short while. And if they would put Fourchenault to the blush, all the better!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_107<tab>それから、これも内緒にしていてほしいのだけれど……
おすすめのお洋服があれば、ぜひ貸していただけないかしら？
フルシュノさんの驚いた顔が見てみたいもの！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Ameliance is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Appointed to House Leveilleur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「ルヴェユールの協力者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Ameliance is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Benefactor of House Leveilleur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「ルヴェユールの恩人」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Ameliance is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Champion of House Leveilleur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「ルヴェユールの英雄」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Ameliance could not be happier with your efforts. She now considers you the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Honorary Scion of House Leveilleur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「ルヴェユールの家族」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if she is to ensure students enrolled in the academic homestead program feel at home in Old Sharlayan. To that end, Ameliance has a new favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、
引き続き、あなたの手助けを必要としているようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, the academic homestead program in Old Sharlayan was a resounding success. It seems, however, that Ameliance has a new favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、
あなたに、新たな依頼をお願いしたいようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Ameliance has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Ameliance and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Ameliance's efforts with the academic homestead program in Old Sharlayan is now available. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Ameliance will be updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>お得意様取引のストーリークエストが発行されました。
ルヴェユール邸の「アメリアンス」から受注できます。
クエストをコンプリートすることで、納品リストが更新されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Future requests will be selected at random from all those you have seen thus far, with the list refreshed once a week (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>今後の依頼は、一週間に一度、
これまでの依頼品の中からランダムで選ばれます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with Ameliance and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>Note that school supplies, school supply materials, and chalky coral will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>なお「学習支援用の支給品」「学習支援用支給品の素材」、
「灰白珊瑚」については、多くの報酬が得られます。
リストに含まれていた場合は、積極的に納品してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>Furthermore, Ameliance's appearance may now be altered through the use of glamours.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>また、以後アメリアンスに、
武具投影を行うことができるようになりました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not only for procuring supplies, but for believing in my vision.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
いつも本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>After everything I have heard of your grand adventures with Alphinaud and Alisaie, never in my wildest dreams did I believe we might find ourselves working together. But I could not have asked for a better partner.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>不思議だわ……子どもたちの大切な仲間であるあなたと、
まさかこんな風にお付き合いすることになるなんて。
これからも頼りにさせてちょうだいね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>Thank you for yet another incredible round of deliveries, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Words can ill express what a boon your help has been to the homestead program.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>今週もたくさんの品を持ってきてくれて、
とっても助かっているわ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>And I would like to think we have become good friends through our work together, as well. Fourchenault would no doubt be shocked─perhaps even envious─were he to see what we've accomplished thus far.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>もしも今フルシュノさんが帰ってきたら、
あなたと私が親しくしているのを見て、とっても驚くでしょうね。
……ふふっ、想像したら可笑しくなっちゃう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Your generosity knows no bounds, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I cannot thank you enough.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>いつもありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>'Tis not mine intent to embarrass, you understand, but each time you visit, the servants are always quite excited to see you. To say your very presence is an inspiration would be an understatement.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>ふふっ、うちの使用人の子たちね、
あなたがおうちに来てくれると、とっても張り切るのよ。
もちろん、いつもよく働いてくれているのだけどね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>When I first married into the Leveilleur family, they patiently taught me all of the fancy etiquette and manners expected of a lady of the house. And, when Alphinaud and Alisaie were born, they spared no effort in helping me look after them. I am thankful to have them with us, each and every day.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>私がこの家に嫁いだときも、いろいろな作法を教えてくれたし、
アルフィノとアリゼーの面倒も、本当によくみてくれた。
みんな大切な、自慢の家族なのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_000<tab>Do you have a moment to spare, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、聞いてくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>I received a letter from Alphinaud, you see, but I wonder if it would be best not to mention our work together in my reply.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>レターモーグリがアルフィノからの手紙を届けてくれたのだけど、
あなたとお仕事していることを、お返事に書くかどうか迷ってて。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_002<tab>It would make for a wonderful surprise when next he returns, but...I imagine Alisaie would be cross to know we kept such secrets. Which, frankly, makes it all the more tempting...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_002<tab>内緒にして驚かせようとも思ったのだけれど……。
とくにアリゼーには、早めに報せておいた方がいいかしらね。
ふふふ、どう思う？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_000<tab>'Tis good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If I might bend your ear for a moment, there's something I wished to tell you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
今日も来てくれて嬉しいわ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_001<tab>When I first began this enterprise, I was riddled with doubt. It was only after you came, and agreed to help, that I began to feel my uncertainty wash away.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_001<tab>最初はね、この事業がうまくいくかどうか、不安に思っていたのよ。
でも、あなたが来てくれて……協力してくれると言ってくれて、
不安なんて一気に吹き飛んじゃった。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_002<tab>I think I now understand why Alphinaud and Alisaie have spoken so highly of you all this time. I very much look forward to seeing what we might achieve together.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_005_002<tab>今なら、アルフィノとアリゼーの気持ちがよくわかるわ。
あなたとなら、どこまでも、何だってできる気がするのだもの。
ふふっ、これからもよろしくね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_000<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but do you have a moment? Lest you worry, it is nothing serious. I merely wish to offer a word of thanks.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
少しだけお時間をいただいてもいいかしら？
なんだか、改まってお礼を言いたくなってしまって。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_001<tab>You have proven to be not only an exceptional business partner, but also a dear friend. Not only to me, but Alphinaud, Alisaie, and even my husband Fourchenault.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_001<tab>お得意様として、ここまで懇意にしてくれていることも、
もちろん心の底から感謝しているのだけれど……
アルフィノとアリゼー、それからフルシュノさんのこと。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_002<tab>Time and again you have risked everything to protect those dearest to me, and no matter how great the peril, you have always given me hope that they would return home.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_002<tab>私のかけがえのない大切な人たちを、守ってくれてありがとう。
……必ず帰ってくると、信じさせてくれてありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_003<tab>To put it simply, I've come to think of you as part of the family. I know better than to ask you not do anything reckless─I expect you will always do what you must. But if I may make one request, it would be that you visit after your grand adventures, if only for my peace of mind.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_003<tab>それから、今はあなただって大事な存在なのよ。
仲間や守りたいもののために、無茶をするなとは言わない。
それでも、大冒険のあとは顔を見せにきてくれたら安心するわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_004<tab>Oh, but look at me, prattling on. I had better let you go. Take care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and remember─you are always welcome here.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_006_004<tab>ふふふ、これからもよろしくね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Ameliance.
